ygData.subject: Re: thieves and trapped
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought you opened the doors to let the troops in. Foxfingers saw the door begin to close. He had two options, either face whatever was on the other side or

I thought you opened the doors to let the troops in.

Foxfingers saw the door begin to close. He had two options, either face
whatever was on the other side or get trapped in the acid room again.
Without Razor Claws shield he knew he'd be toast. The desperate thief dove
through the door at the last second leaving him trapped in a hallway instead
of a room. "Damn that mutant" he thought realizing that the two were now
seperated.

Remaining in Wolverine mode Razor Claw shot through door after door as they
slid shut. By the time he'd stopped he'd lost track of where he was.
Stopping to get his berrings he found himself somewhere near the Predacon
crew quarters. The mutant wolverine smelled the mech fluid in the air and
knew that he was badly out numbered if he stayed there.Transforming to
raptor mode he readied himself for the fight to come.

In a nearby quarters Bullet found himself bored out of his circuits. Being
confined to quarters for failing to protect Chameleon sucked rocks but the
bullish bot knew that he had to follow orders and sit out his sentence.
----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, September 03, 2001 4:31 PM
Subject: Re: thieves and trapped


>
>
> BlackFortress::

> Internal defences of BlackFortress turned on and open fire againts
> Foxfingers and Razorclaws. other Slidded door closed behin and
> infront of the muntants in that way that they could ran away and hide
> in any place. The doors could resist every sort of weapons.
>

> > Razor Claw transformed to Wolverine mode and in a blink of time he
> shot out of the room into the hallway.
> >
> > Foxfingers waited hoping that the Predacons would turn and chase
> the blur that had just sped by. If they hesitated he would strike
> from behind.
> >
> > Silver Scout sniffed the air, she could sense the tension coming
> from all around her. Moving slowly she moved out of the corner that
> she'd been hiding in.
> >
> > Blaze searched carefully for Silver Scout. If anyone asked she'd
> make up a story but the tigress hoped she wouldn't run into anyone
> who knew of her orders.
